mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.name userName, o.name corporateName FROM [Certificate] c LEFT JOIN [user] u ON c.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN [corporate] o ON c.corporateId = o.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c.*, u.name userName, o.name corporateName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.id DESC) 행번호 FROM [Certificate] c LEFT JOIN [user] u ON c.userId = u.id LEFT JOIN [corporate] o ON c.corporateId = o.id WHERE [type] = #{order} AND (#{corporateId} IS NULL OR #{corporateId} = 0 OR #{corporateId} = c.corporateId) AND ((#{srchType} = 0) OR (#{srchType} = 1 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, personName) > 0) OR (#{srchType} = 2 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, personNo) > 0)) ) subquery WHERE 행번호 > (#{currentPage} - 1) * #{pageSize} AND 행번호 <= #{currentPage} * #{pageSize} ORDER BY 행번호

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [Certificate] c WHERE [type] = #{order} AND (#{corporateId} IS NULL OR #{corporateId} = 0 OR #{corporateId} = c.corporateId) AND ((#{srchType} = 0) OR (#{srchType} = 1 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, personName) = 1) OR (#{srchType} = 2 AND CHARINDEX(#{srchText,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, personNo) = 1))
mapper.insert: INSERT [Certificate] (type, certificateNo, userId, createDate, personNo, personName, department, amount, body, corporateId) VALUES (#{type}, #{certificateNo}, #{userId}, #{createDate}, #{personNo}, #{personName}, #{department}, #{amount}, #{body}, #{corporateId})
mapper.select: DECLARE @n INT, @year CHAR(4) SET @year = YEAR(GETDATE()) SET @n = ( SELECT MAX(CONVERT(INT, RIGHT(certificateNo,4))) FROM [Certificate] WHERE CHARINDEX(@year, certificateNo) = 1 AND LEN(certificateNo) = 9 AND ISNUMERIC(RIGHT(certificateNo,4)) = 1 AND [type] = #{type}) SET @n = ISNULL(@n,0) + 1 SELECT @year + '-' + REPLACE(STR(@n,4), ' ', '0')
